data.title: You Will Not Be Hungry When Done
data.text: Using an internet search for some food specials it directed me to Russo's.A nice combo package of stromboli,wings and 2 liter soda was ordered and what was to be needed for 2 was enough to feed 4.Stromboli melted in my mouth and the wings were very tasty in the mild sauce with a Bleu Cheese dipping sauce.Pizza looked and smelled quite good and the service was quick with the food still being very hot upon arriving back at the room.There should be something to choose from as the menu is quite expansive for a Pizza/ Sub Shop.Only issue could be parking since it is on the main street in center city Reading.

data.title: Foodchat.com
data.text: This pizzeria is know for there pizza and also Italian cuisine. So I experienced the meat lovers stuffed pizza which was packed with meat and cheeses. His was one of the best meat lovers pizzas that I've had in a long time. The service was also very good and recommended a chicken cheese steak sandwich which was very tasty as well. The sandwich had mushrooms, pulled chicken seasoned well, onions and also provolone cheese just melting all throughout the sandwich.   I will return when I'm in the downtown Reading, PA area again.

data.title: Delicious salad
data.text: Had a great salad from here with my husband on a busy Friday night. Very friendly staff and waitress.

data.title: Disappointed/hungry!
data.text:
Never call here at lunch time for a delivery. 
They tell you hold on a minute and never come back to phone. 
Then you call back and phone is off hook.
So rude and stupid!

data.title: Very Good food and awesome server
data.text:
There are not a lot of options to eat after 5:00 PM in downtown Reading, but this would be a place to go even if there were many options.  It doesn't look like much, but the food far exceeded my expectations.  The pizza is what I envision when I think of New York pizza, you fold the slice to eat it and it's delicious.  I had the stromboli and tasted my son's pizza slices.  The stromboli was a little different that what I am used to but was very good.  The server was awesome, she had misheard and brought me the wrong boli, she didn't hesitate, took it back promising to get the right one asap and she did, coming back as soon as new one was made (they had to give it a priority because it came out in amount of time it probably took to put it together and go through oven). 
Would definitely eat here again next time we are in Reading.

data.title: Amazing Food!!!
data.text:
This place is amazing. I went for lunch with a local business client who enjoys the place. It is basically a grocery store with a family run deli in it and a dining area.

The only complaint I had was that my stomach wasn't large enough to try everything!!!

The food is incredibly fresh, prepared to perfection, be it sandwiches or authentic Italian dishes.

So forget the chains and next trip here, you have got to go to Russo's!

data.title: Small Place, Good Food and Service
data.text:
We ate here before the season opening game of the 2013 Kelly Cup Champions Reading Royals at the renamed Santander Arena.  It is just a short walk down the street.

Small store front but the staff was friendly and the service was fast.  You can tell they take pride in their business.  My adult son was with me and we had a mini boli (Philly Steak), a slice of stuffed pizza (Philly Steak) and a slice of white pizza.  The food was very good and the sodas were not just a cup filled with ice like at many places.

We will be back again.
